section.p: Standard or itemized deductions reduce the amount of tax you owe.

Most people take the standard deduction, but you can itemize your deductions if you have a mortgage, large gifts to charity, or large medical expenses. For most people, the standard deduction amount is higher than the amount they'd get by itemizing.

section.h2: Qualified mortgage interest and investment interest expenses
section.p: If you borrowed money to buy a home or investment property, you can deduct the interest you paid on that loan. You can also deduct your mortgage insurance premiums.
